hero.title: Transcend Your Situation
hero.subtitle: Transform your vision into reality with ALFA Academy
hero.description: ALFA Academy accompanies you on your entrepreneurial journey to develop your potential and achieve your ambitions.

about.title: About ALFA Academy
about.subtitle: We help you unlock your potential
about.description: ALFA Academy is an organization specialized in entrepreneurial training in Cameroon. Our mission is to provide young entrepreneurs with the tools and knowledge necessary to succeed in a constantly evolving economic environment.
about.visionText: To create a generation of innovative African entrepreneurs, capable of transforming the economy of their country and continent.
about.missionText: To accompany entrepreneurs on their journey by offering quality training, personalized mentoring, and a solid network.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our membership offers
services.description: ALFA Academy offers different packages adapted to your needs and your level of experience in entrepreneurship.
